name: Night Hag
description: Night Hags have withered, gray skin and glowing red eyes, embodying nightmares and despair.
memorable: Their ability to infiltrate dreams and sap life force makes them uniquely dangerous.
goals: To haunt and torment mortals, feeding on their fear and misery.
relations: Often collect souls for trade in infernal markets.
environment: Typically found in dark or eerie locations that resonate with fear.
strengths: Solid defenses, including magic resistance and powerful spellcasting.
weaknesses: Relatively low mobility and reliance on magical powers.
attacks: Attacks with claws for slashing damage and inflicts curses to weaken foes.
most_powerful_ability: Nightmare Haunting, which can reduce a target's hit point maximum and capture their soul.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Highly skilled in Deception and Insight, making it effective in manipulation.
additional_information: Can shapeshift into a more appealing form to deceive targets.
Emits an aura of malevolence to unsettle foes.
Access to powerful spells such as Plane Shift and Sleep.
Cursed targets suffer disadvantage on attack rolls against the hag for 30 days.
Can enter the Ethereal Plane for tactical advantages.
spellcasting: Can innately cast spells like detect thoughts and sleep, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.
